import{createAction}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import{v4 as uuidv4}from'uuid';var addContact=createAction('contacts/add',function(name,number){return{payload:{id:uuidv4(),name:name,number:number}};});var deleteContact=createAction('contacts/delete');var filter=createAction('contacts/filter');// eslint-disable-next-line import/no-anonymous-default-export
export default{addContact:addContact,deleteContact:deleteContact,filter:filter};
